name: Comm Officer Scheffer
descriptions: Comm Officer Scheffer is the communications officer stationed at Ranger Station Delta in 2281.
Scheffer is the communications officer for Ranger Station Delta. Because her particular post is not as exciting, she'd prefer to be on patrol.
affiliation: New California RepublicNew California Republic Rangers

topics.response_text: {Player not in NCR gear}I'm not supposed to let civilians just walk around this place. There better be a good reason for you being here.

topics.topic_text: I've brought radio security code updates from Sergeant Reyes at Camp Forlorn Hope.
topics.response_text: Very well. You can tell Reyes that this station is secure.
I'm in charge of the radio - hence the title "Comm Officer." I'd much rather be out on patrol, since nothing much happens around here.

topics.topic_text: I'd like to know more about the Rangers.
topics.response_text: Well, when there's trouble regular NCR troops can't handle, they send in a Ranger. Problem solved.
